channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 10inch, localised, deep pothole., 17th April
item.description:
Travelling up hill, just through first traffic calming chicane, after cricket club, in the middle of carriageway.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greenway Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pot hole, repaired badly not long ago, all the filler came out again, 17th April
item.description:
At end of Bournside rd/Hatherly rd
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Hatherley Court Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 17th April
item.description:
Customer reporting that laburnum tree has fallen down outside 200 Hatherley Rd and is partially blocking the pathway Small saw (not chainsaw) required - root ball is still intact and customer was unable to detach.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 17th April
item.description:
Customer has called about the wall and vegetation in the raised bed section on Saylittle Mews. They have concerns that the wall may fall and damage the SL (column 2) and unsure of responsibility.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large quantities of bird faeces, 17th April
item.description:
On the pavement/promenade opposite the war memorial in Abbey terrace. The faeces runs the length of the promenade and constitutes a health hazard to the general public. Let's not wait until people get ill. Thank you for your time.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Abbey Terrace, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet
